titles.title: Social Security Benefit Protection Act
A bill to ensure the timely payment of Social Security benefits in August 2011.
Social Security Benefit Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Social Security Benefit Protection Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue U.S. obligations in an amount equal to the monthly insurance benefits payable under title II (Old Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act in August 2011.
Exempts such obligations from the public debt limit.
